results.name: Decimal expansion of (2487411+1629850*sqrt(2))/967^2.
comment: Equals lim_{n -> infinity} b(n)/b(n-1) for n mod 3 = 0, b = A130017.
Equals lim_{n -> infinity} b(n)/b(n-1) for n mod 3 = 1, b = A159701.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
xref: Cf. A130017, A159701, A002193 (decimal expansion of sqrt(2)), A159702 (decimal expansion of (969+44*sqrt(2))/967).
results.author: _Klaus Brockhaus_, Apr 21 2009
